snippet: A lawyer for the lead producer of the recently canceled musical “Rebecca” said that criminal investigators had interviewed his client about the murky circumstances surrounding the loss of $4.5 million in investor financing.
abstract: Lawyer for Ben Sprecher, the lead producer of the canceled Broadway musical Rebecca, says that a law enforcement agency is conducting an inquiry into circumstances surrounding the last-minute loss of $4.5 million in investor financing, which led the $12 million show to collapse.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for the lead producer of the recently canceled musical “Rebecca” said that criminal investigators had interviewed his client about the murky circumstances surrounding the loss of $4.5 million in investor financing.

headline.seo: ‘Rebecca’ Cancellation Sets Investors’ Lawyers in Action
headline.main: ‘Rebecca’ Cancellation Sets Investors’ Lawyers in Action
headline.print_headline: Broadway, More Gothic Even Than Manderley
